description: Very long incident description that contains multiple sentences and technical details about the system failure including error codes, stack traces, and detailed reproduction steps that would typically be found in a comprehensive incident report with maximum character limits being tested to ensure the system can handle edge cases properly

impact: Extremely detailed impact analysis covering all aspects of the business including financial implications, customer satisfaction metrics, regulatory compliance concerns, operational disruptions, technical debt accumulation, and long-term strategic consequences that would require extensive documentation and stakeholder communication
affected_system: Comprehensive list of all interconnected systems including primary databases, backup systems, load balancers, API gateways, message queues, caching layers, monitoring tools, logging infrastructure, security services, and third-party integrations spanning multiple cloud providers and geographic regions
